title: Referral System

embed.description: League of Legends is a team game, and your best friends make the best teammates. We've updated the Refer-a-Friend programing to thank you for bringing your friends into League. Log in and invite your friends today!

body: So apparently they've upgraded the refer a friend system, was wondering if u could only redem the award only on the Na server is this true? and if not how can i redem it via oce?

replies.body: Think that's true. We don't have referals on OCE.
